statements: UPDATE in_game_transactions SET transaction_amount = 100 WHERE transaction_id = '4755b8c6-06ad-4d8e-aef2-451828185c6a';
UPDATE in_game_transactions SET transaction_type = 'Credit', transaction_date = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE player_id = 'f76afba6-1f3b-4b97-9143-73d46aee308e';
UPDATE in_game_transactions SET transaction_amount = 50.75, transaction_type = 'Bonus' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';

UPDATE in_game_transactions SET transaction_type = 'Purchase', player_id = '1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7a8b-9c0d-1a2b3c4d5e6f', transaction_amount = 100, transaction_date = '2022-01-25 12:30:45' WHERE transaction_id = '345e6789-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE in_game_purchases SET purchase_amount = 15.99 WHERE purchase_id = 1001;
UPDATE virtual_currency_transactions SET transaction_amount = 500.00, transaction_type = 'DEPOSIT' WHERE transaction_id = 2002;
UPDATE in_game_purchases SET purchase_amount = 25.99, purchase_date = '2022-02-15' WHERE purchase_id = 101;
UPDATE virtual_currency_transactions SET transaction_amount = 10.50, transaction_type = 'Purchase', transaction_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE transaction_id = 201;
UPDATE purchases SET item_price = 15.99 WHERE purchase_id = '3f8d21a0-9df6-4d5c-af3b-502e2d237859';
UPDATE users SET total_spent = total_spent + 50.25, virtual_currency_balance = virtual_currency_balance - 10.00 WHERE user_id = 'cd5a53ff-132d-4c9b-b624-64ea0d81b95a';
UPDATE purchases SET item_price = 25.75, item_name = 'New Item Name' WHERE purchase_id = 'e919a3c0-7844-4fca-aa58-7b6281088c94';
UPDATE users SET total_spent = total_spent + 50.00, virtual_currency_balance = virtual_currency_balance - 20.00, join_date = '2022-01-20' WHERE user_id = '158e8f8f-187b-4120-96c2-a41703a6f76b';
UPDATE in_game_players SET coins_balance = 1000 WHERE player_id = 101;
UPDATE items_catalog SET item_price = 50, item_description = 'New Description' WHERE item_id = 201;
UPDATE in_game_players SET player_level = 10, coins_balance = 500 WHERE player_id = 101;
UPDATE items_catalog SET item_price = 200, item_description = 'New description' WHERE item_id = 201;
UPDATE purchases SET item_price = 15.99, item_name = 'New Item Name' WHERE purchase_id = 1001;
UPDATE users SET account_balance = 500.00, username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 2002;
UPDATE users SET account_balance = account_balance + 100.50 WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE items SET item_price = item_price * 1.15, item_description = CONCAT(item_description, ' (updated)') WHERE item_id = 54321;
